attributes.action: block the proposed legislation for sensible shoes to be mandatory in all UK bar and clubs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned vehemently oppose the Government proposals to enforce a strict no-trainers rule in all UK clubs and bars.  With the legislation proposing that all night venues enforce a shoes-only rule in the name of health & safety and correct social attire statutes, we demand the Government stop their nanny state culture and let us wear our Converse in peace!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
